description: AIScaffold is a web-based agent for scaffold diversification using the deep generative model. AIScaffold can perform large-scale diversification in several minutes and recommend the top 500 molecules. Features such as site-specific diversification are also supported. This agent can facilitate the scaffold diversification process for medicinal chemists, thereby accelerating drug design.
name: AIScaffold

metadata.abstract: Â© Molecular scaffolds are widely used in drug design. Many methods and agents have been developed to utilize the information in scaffolds. Scaffold diversification is frequently used by medicinal chemists in tasks such as lead compound optimization, but agents for scaffold diversification are still lacking. Here, we propose AIScaffold (https://iaidrug.stonewise.cn), a web-based agent for scaffold diversification using the deep generative model. This agent can perform large-scale (up to 500,000 molecules) diversification in several minutes and recommend the top 500 (top 0.1%) molecules. Features such as site-specific diversification are also supported. This agent can facilitate the scaffold diversification process for medicinal chemists, thereby accelerating drug design.
metadata.journal: Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling
metadata.title: AIScaffold: A Web-Based Agent for Scaffold Diversification Using Deep Learning
